title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid email and password, role-based access is established, and session timeout is set to 5 minutes.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click on login button
User is authenticated successfully
User is redirected to dashboard with access tailored to their role
Session timeout is set to 5 minutes of inactivity

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when user enters incorrect email or password with appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email and/or password
Click on login button
Login is denied
Appropriate error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

title: Session logout after 5 minutes inactivity
description: Verify that the user session automatically ends and user is logged out after 5 minutes of no activity.

steps.description: Login successfully
Remain inactive on any page for 5 minutes
User is automatically logged out after timeout period
User is redirected to login page

title: Dashboard displays real-time metrics and notifications based on user role
description: Verify that after login, the dashboard loads real-time data and notifications tailored to the logged-in user's role.

steps.description: Login as different user roles (e.g., counselor, accountant, HR staff)
Navigate to dashboard page
Dashboard displays metrics relevant to user role
Notifications are displayed and updated in real-time with latency under 100ms

title: Lead capture from multiple channels
description: Verify the system captures leads correctly from all integrated marketing channels including Facebook, Instagram, and Google Forms, and supports manual lead input.

steps.description: Submit lead through Facebook marketing integration
Submit lead through Instagram marketing integration
Submit lead through Google Forms integration
Manually add lead via CRM interface
Each lead appears correctly in the Lead Management module
Leads are assigned to counselors as per configuration

title: Multi-stage lead and visa case workflow
description: Verify that leads and visa cases move accurately through their multi-stage workflows, including status updates, document uploads, and communication logging.

steps.description: Create a new lead
Advance lead through initial screening, document submission, and approval stages
Upload required visa documents during workflow
Add communication entries to the lead/case
Workflow stages update correctly in the system
Documents are securely stored and accessible only to authorized roles
Communication logs are correctly recorded and visible to permitted users

title: Coaching module enrollment and schedule management
description: Verify that students can be enrolled in coaching classes, schedules are created/managed properly, and attendance is tracked along with performance recording.

steps.description: Enroll student into a coaching class batch
Create and assign teacher schedules
Record student attendance for scheduled classes
Record student performance metrics
Enrollment is reflected in the coaching module correctly
Schedules show correct timings and participants
Attendance records are stored and visible to teachers and counselors
Performance data is stored and accessible for reporting

title: Employee attendance, leave request, and payroll integration
description: Verify that employee attendance is recorded, leave requests are submitted and approved via workflows, and integrated payroll reflects attendance and leave data.

steps.description: Record daily attendance for an employee
Submit leave request for approval
Approve or reject leave request via manager workflow
Generate payroll and verify attendance and leave impact on salary
Attendance data is correctly saved
Leave requests change statuses accurately and notifications are sent
Payroll reflects attendance and approved leave accurately

title: Financial transactions and multi-currency handling
description: Verify that all financial transactions are accurately processed including invoicing, multi-currency support, and that reports generate correctly.

steps.description: Create financial transactions in different currencies
Generate invoices for transactions
Generate financial reports in various formats
Transactions are logged correctly with currency conversions applied
Invoices display correct amounts and currencies
Reports export accurately with correct data

title: B2B SaaS partner lead submission and quota enforcement
description: Verify that partner agencies can submit leads, track quota usage, have restricted visibility, and permissions enforced.

steps.description: Login as a B2B partner agency user
Submit leads through partner interface
Attempt to access restricted modules outside of permission
Lead quota limits are enforced and tracked
Restricted modules are inaccessible

title: Task creation, assignment, status update with notifications
description: Verify tasks can be created, assigned to users, updated with status changes, and notifications are sent accordingly with audit trails.

steps.description: Create a new task with priority and status
Assign task to a user
Update task status through workflow
Task details and status updates are saved accurately
Assigned user receives notifications on creation and updates
Audit log accurately records task changes with timestamps

title: Support ticket lifecycle with SLA management
description: Verify support tickets can be raised, categorized, progressed through resolution stages, and SLA timings tracked with escalation if breached.

steps.description: Raise a new support ticket with category and priority
Assign ticket to support agent
Advance ticket through resolution stages
Ticket status and category updates are logged
SLA timers track response times correctly
Escalations occur if SLA deadlines are missed

title: Internal messenger real-time communication
description: Verify users can send and receive instant messages via internal messenger with message delivery within 100ms and message history logged.

steps.description: Send a message from user A to user B
User B receives the message within 100ms
Reply from user B to user A
User A receives reply in real-time
Message history is logged and displayed correctly

title: User profile update and role management by admin
description: Verify users can update their profiles and administrators can manage user roles, statuses, and permissions correctly across the system.

steps.description: User updates personal profile information
Profile changes are saved and reflected in UI
Admin updates roles and permissions of a user
Role-based access is updated and enforced immediately

title: Security: Data encryption and row-level security enforcement
description: Verify that sensitive data is encrypted at rest and in transit; row-level security restricts data access to authorized users only.

steps.description: Attempt to access confidential data with authorized user
Data is accessible and decrypted properly
Attempt to access same data with unauthorized user role
Access is denied based on row-level security policy
Verify data encryption in database storage
Data is stored encrypted at rest

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility compliance
description: Verify the CRM UI is responsive on desktop and mobile devices and meets WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open CRM UI on multiple browsers and mobile devices
UI adapts fluidly to different screen sizes
Perform accessibility audit using WCAG 2.1 tools
All pages and components comply with WCAG 2.1 guidelines

title: System scalability and performance under load
description: Verify system supports 500+ concurrent users and handles 100,000+ records with no performance degradation.

steps.description: Simulate 500+ concurrent users performing typical CRM activities
Load database with 100,000+ student and transaction records
System responds with acceptable latency and no errors
UI remains responsive under load

title: Backup and recovery process validation
description: Verify backup processes maintain data integrity and system uptime of 99.9%, and that data can be restored correctly from backups.

steps.description: Trigger or review scheduled backup process
Backup completes without errors and data integrity is validated
Simulate data restore from backup
System data is restored to correct state

title: Audit logging of user actions
description: Verify that all user actions involving data changes, logins, and critical operations are logged with timestamps and details.

steps.description: Perform user activities such as create, update, delete records
Login and logout the user
Audit logs contain detailed entries with user ID, timestamp, action type, and affected records
